The 16 teams of the Central, Eastern, and Western Divisions competed in a 50-game schedule. The top 12 teams made the playoffs. The winner of the MetJHL playoffs, the [[Wexford Raiders]], failed to defeat the [[Milton Merchants]] of the [[OPJHL]] for the OHA's Buckland Cup. ==Changes== *MetJHL rejoins the [[Ontario Hockey Association]]. *[[Pittsburgh Jr. Penguins]] join MetJHL. *Muskoka Bears become [[Huntsville Wildcats]]. *Thornhill Islanders become [[Thornhill Rattlers]]. *[[Aurora Tigers]] leave MetJHL for [[OPJHL]]. *At the end of the season, league closes doors and teams merge with [[OPJHL]]. ==Final standings== ''Note: GP = Games played;
